Service Details: - Supports hunting, fishing and shooting activities and is actively involved in wildlife conservation and habitat restoration- Member of the British Columbia Wildlife Federation and offers federally inspected and approved outdoor ranges for Trap, (ISSF), air and target pistol, IPSC, and Archery- Also offers 100- and 200-yard rifle ranges as well as a shotgun range- Encourages family participation and has a well organized and growing juniors program- Offers a hall for rent with full kitchen facilities and seating capacity for up to 165 people
